hero.title: Next.js template and CI/CD solutions for businesses in China.
hero.subtitle: Built for developers needing solutions for deploying overseas services in China, with integrated Alibaba Cloud FC deployment and best practices.

fc.title: Alibaba Cloud FC
fc.description: Built-in Alibaba Cloud FC deployment configuration, seamless switch from Vercel, solving access speed issues in China.

supabase.title: Supabase Integration
supabase.description: Integration with Alibaba Cloud PolarDB Supabase, providing distributed database solutions in China.

i18n.title: i18n Support
i18n.description: Complete i18n solution using next-intl, supporting English and Chinese, easily extensible to other languages.

http.title: HTTP Template
http.description: Preset API route structure and error handling, Zod validation, integrated TanStack Query for efficient data fetching and caching.

tech.title: Modern Tech Stack
tech.description: Built with Next.js 15 and React 19, using Tailwind CSS, Radix UI components and TypeScript.

ready.title: Ready to Use
ready.description: Built-in authentication, tables, forms and other common components, providing a complete development scaffold to start your project quickly.
